Several  spells  of  showers  will  occur
Kankasanthurai. Showers or thundershowers may occur at  few places in the other sea areas around the
Winds will be Northerly to North-westerly in the sea areas off the costs extending from Mannar to Batticaloa
via Kankasanthurai and Trincomalee. Wind speed will be (30-40) kmph and it will increase up to (50-55)
kmph at times in these sea areas. Winds will be variable in direction in the other sea areas around the island
and wind speed will be (20-30) kmph.
The sea areas off the coast extending from Mannar to Batticaloa via Kankasanthurai and Trincomalee will
be fairly rough at times. The other sea areas around the island may be moderate.
